title: WE ARE THE MONSTERS
lyrics:
How long?
Must I be waiting here?
Slowly drowning in my darkest fear
How long?
Until the end is near?

I'm fitting out until I disappear



All we ever

Wanted was love

Was love



We are the monsters





We are the monsters

And we are the same

Yeah we are the monsters

And we have survived



We are to blame



Going out to fade away

Fill my up man its hard to say

If I'm okay but I'm alive and well today



I'm alive

I'm alive

I'm alive and well



I'll survive

I'll survive

We'll survive enough



I'm alive

I'm alive

I'm alive and well



I'll survive

I'll survive

We'll survive enough



All we ever

Wanted was love

Was love



We are the monsters





We are the monsters

And we are the same

(All we ever wanted was love)

(Was Love)



Yeah we are the monsters

(All we ever wanted was love)

(Was Love



Yeah we are to blame

Yeah we are the monsters
